name: Not Too Close!
description: Use the arrow keys to move both characters at the same time but if thye get within 1 tile of each other they are brought back to the start of the level. grey tiles are walls, orange tiles are lava, light grey tiles are lava that only affects boxes, brown tiles are pushable boxes, and purple tiles are buttons that remove parts of the walls when a box is placed on them. Your main objective is to get the blue character on the blue circle, and the red character on the red circle at the same time.
